Uses of Class
gametools.Area

  • Packages that use Area 
    Package Description
    gametools
    A lightweight and simple to use library for creating 2D games in Java.
    gametools.gravity
    Package containing additional tools for creating a side scroller styled game with gravity.

    • Uses of Area in gametools

      Subclasses of Area in gametools 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Graphic
      Combines the area and animation classes into one object.
      class  Sprite
      Used for adding movement and behavior for graphics.
      Fields in gametools declared as Area 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Area Area.UNDEFINED_AREA
      An empty area to represent a non existent or undefined object.
      Methods in gametools that return Area 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Area Game.getArea()
      Returns the screen size.
      Area Sprite.getMovementArea()
      Returns the area in which the sprite is allowed to move with the movement commands.
      Methods in gametools with parameters of type Area 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double Position.angleTo(Area obj)
      Uses trigonometry to calculate the angle to center of the specified object.
      void Area.centerOn(Area obj)
      Sets the object position to the center of the passed in object
      double Position.dist(Area obj)
      Calculates the distance to the center of object using pythagorean theorem.
      void Sprite.face(Area obj)
      Sets the angle of the sprite to face the center of the specified object.
      java.util.List<Sprite> Group.getAllWithin(Area obj)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new array list.
      java.util.List<Sprite> Group.getAllWithin(Area obj, Area.Collision method)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the object (using the specified collision method) as a new array list.
      boolean Position.isInside(Area obj)
      Checks if the point is inside the specified object.
      boolean Area.isWithin(Area obj)
      Checks if the object is colliding with another object or area using rectangular collision and touch collision as the collision detection method.
      boolean Group.isWithin(Area obj)
      Checks if at least one element is colliding with the passed in object.
      boolean Area.isWithin(Area obj, Area.Collision method)
      Checks if the object is colliding with another object or area using rectangular collision and a custom collision method.
      boolean Group.isWithin(Area obj, Area.Collision method)
      Checks if at least one element is colliding with the passed in object.
      void Sprite.lockMovementArea(Area area)
      Defines the area the sprite can move inside.
      static boolean Game.mouseWithin(Area obj)
      Checks if the mouse is currently inside an object.
      static Position Tools.randomPosition(Area area)
      Generates a random position within the passed in area.
      void Area.setArea(Area area)
      Copies over the position and dimensions from the specified area.
      static void Game.setPainterPosition(Area area) 
      void Group.setRemoveArea(Area area)
      Defines the area the sprites can move inside.
      void Sprite.turnTo(Area obj)
      Turns the sprite until it faces the specified object.
      Constructors in gametools with parameters of type Area 
      Constructor and Description
